defaultValue:
Any value below is merely an example for Modders. 
None of the Settings here do anything.

fieldDescription: Strings will accept any characters put in, with no filtering.
A button that switches between true and false.
Int Fields will only accept whole Numbers, and block any other character from being entered.
Doubles allow only numbers and a single decimal dot (.)

Lets users register a keybind. The saved keycodes are the same as used by org.lwjgl.input.Keyboard and Starsectors InputEventAPI.

Make sure to set a condition for your input checks to not accept numbers of 0, as lwjgl sets both unbound & unknown characters to that value.
Creates a color picker, giving both a hex text field and three sliders for the HSV color selection.

secondaryValue: None, Hegemony, Tritachyon, Persean League, Sindrian, Independent
fieldDescription:
Creates a radio button selector. 

The defaultValue decides which one is selected by default, the secondaryValue creates the list of choices with a comma seperated String. 
Can be retrieved as a String.
Make Rokh mines have rainbow glow
